column4: Hello everyone.  This may not be the appropriate place for this question, but I don't know where else to start asking.  My wife got an email for someone who claims to be one of my wife's friends (who took a trip to scottland, got mugged, and asking for help, but my wife know for a fact her friend is not in scottland).  can one trace an IM chat to get a source IP??
contact nearby cyber crime department of police
